mapper.insert: insert into T_IF_AUTO_MOCK ( IF_ID, RSP_CODE, REQUEST_JSON, RESPONSE_JSON ) values( #{ifId}, #{rspCode}, #{requestJson}, #{responseJson})
mapper.select: select ii.ID, ii.IF_NAME, ii.IF_DESC, (select sys.IF_SYS_NAME from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) SYS_NAME, (select pro.IF_PRO_NAME from T_IF_PRO pro where pro.id=ii.IF_PRO_ID and pro.IF_SYS_ID=ii.IF_SYS_ID) PRO_NAME, (select sys.ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) ADDRESS_URL, mm.RSP_CODE, mm.REQUEST_JSON, mm.RESPONSE_JSON, mm.TEST_RESULT from T_IF_INTERFACE ii left join T_IF_AUTO_MOCK mm on ii.ID=mm.IF_ID where ii.ISVALID='Y'

select ID, ii.IF_NAME, ii.IF_DESC, (select sys.IF_SYS_NAME from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) SYS_NAME, (select pro.IF_PRO_NAME from T_IF_PRO pro where pro.id=ii.IF_PRO_ID and pro.IF_SYS_ID=ii.IF_SYS_ID) PRO_NAME, (select sys.ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_SYSTEM sys where sys.id=ii.IF_SYS_ID) ADDRESS_URL from T_IF_INTERFACE ii where ii.ISVALID='Y'
select ID, IF_ID, RSP_CODE, REQUEST_JSON, RESPONSE_JSON, TEST_RESULT from T_IF_AUTO_MOCK where STATUS='Y' and IF_ID=#{ifId}
